akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general Not later than 1 year after November 7, 2000, the Council, 11 So in original. The comma probably should not appear. shall develop an estuary habitat restoration strategy designed to ensure a comprehensive approach to maximize benefits derived from estuary habitat restoration projects and to foster the coordination of Federal and non-Federal activities related to restoration of estuary habitat.
(b) Goal The goal of the strategy shall be the restoration of 1,000,000 acres of estuary habitat by the year 2010.
